Uses of Class
com.cyc.query.exception.QueryConstructionException

  • Packages that use QueryConstructionException 
    Package Description
    com.cyc.query
    Interfaces for asking arbitrarily complex queries of a Cyc server, and processing the answers.
    com.cyc.query.spi
    All Query API service provider interfaces.

    • Uses of QueryConstructionException in com.cyc.query

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Query QueryFactory.getQuery(KbIndividual id)
      Constructs a Query from a KbIndividual corresponding to #$CycLQuerySpecification.
      static Query QueryFactory.getQuery(KbIndividual id, Map<KbObject,Object> indexicals)
      Returns a new Query loaded from a term in Cyc specifying its properties.

      static Query QueryFactory.getQuery(Sentence sent, Context ctx, InferenceParameters params) 
      static Query QueryFactory.getQuery(String queryStr)
      constructs a Query working with the string queryStr.
      static Query QueryFactory.getQuery(String idStr, Map<String,String> indexicals)
      Returns a Query object defined by a CycLQuerySpecification term, and substitutes in relevant values from the indexicals Map.
      static Query QueryFactory.getQuery(String queryStr, String ctxStr)
      Returns a query object defined by queryStr asked in Microtheory ctxStr, with default inference parameters.
      static Query QueryFactory.getQuery(String queryStr, String ctxStr, String queryParams)
      Returns a query object defined by queryStr asked in Microtheory ctxStr, with inference parameters, queryParams.
      Query Query.merge(Query otherQuery)
      Conjoin this sentence with otherQuery, attempting to unify and rename variables.
      KbIndividual Query.saveAs(String name)
      Saves this Query as a new query term with the specified name.
